rows.label: qst201333_msg0001
rows.name:
Rex... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0002
rows.name:
Don't thank me... I don't know what
we'd have done without you.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0003
rows.name:
It's thanks to you that all the children
are safe. If anything, I'm the one who's
grateful to you - everyone is!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0004
rows.name:
Your words are all the reward
I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0005
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0006
rows.name:
Nia... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0007
rows.name:
Nah, don't thank me. Actually, I don't
know what we'd've done without you!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0008
rows.name:
If it weren't for you, who knows what
might've happened to those kids?
We're all grateful for your hard work!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0009
rows.name:
Your words are all the reward
I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0010
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0011
rows.name:
Meleph... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0012
rows.name:
Please, do not thank me.
It is us who should be thanking you.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0013
rows.name:
If it were not for you, I fear we would
never have been able to secure the
children's safety. So thank you, Tokiha.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0014
rows.name:
Your words are all the reward
I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0015
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0016
rows.name:
Zeke... Thank you for allowing me
to handle this whole affair.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0017
rows.name:
Hey hey, don't you go thanking me.
I'm just glad we had you around!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0018
rows.name:
Who knows what would've happened
to those kids if you hadn't found 'em?
We should all be thanking you!

rows.label: qst201333_msg0019
rows.name:
Your words are all the reward
I could ask for.

rows.label: qst201333_msg0020
rows.name:
I will follow you with pride for
as long as I live, my Driver!
